title: Corgi puppy Winston says hello to baby for the first time after finding her in her car seat
text:
Corgi puppy Winston met six-month-old Evie for the first time in an adorable clip.

Jessica Epps had her niece Evie come to visit at her home in Cocoa Beach, Florida, when she introduced the tot to three-month-old Winston.

Video shows Winston sniffing Evie as she lies in her car seat on the floor.

Corgi puppy Winston meets baby Evie for the first time in an adorable clip. The tot lies in her car seat as the dog sniffs and licks her

With his feet perched up so he is at eye level with tot, Winston licks the little girl's fingers as she places them by his mouth.

An onlooker can be heard saying: 'Did you find a new friend?' as the fascinated dog continues to get to know her.

Evie grins as Winston fusses around her before reaching out to him as if asking for a hug.

When excited Evie grabs the puppy's face, Winston calmly wiggles away before continuing to play

Onlookers can be heard cooing in the background at the sweet interaction.

Excited Evie then grabs the puppy's face, pulling him closer to her, and the dog swiftly wiggles free.

But this doesn't put Winston off and he resumes sniffing, getting right up to Evie's face as the little girl smiles.
description: Jessica Epps had her niece Evie come to visit at her home in Cocoa Beach, Florida. She introduced the tot to three-month-old Winston who sniffs and licks the baby as she lies in her car seat.
